item.title: Scope Ratings 指出，美国财政赤字扩大日益令人担忧
item.description: 范围评级公司（Scope Ratings）表示，美国财政赤字的扩大日益令人担忧，而债务上限问题的反复僵持以及相关的接近或技术性违约风险仍是美国信用评级前景负面的一个关键因素。【原文：A widening U.S. fiscal deficit is a growing concern and the threat of recurrent debt-ceiling standoffs and associated risk of a near or technical default remains a key factor behind the negative outlook for the country's credit rating, Scope Ratings said.】

item.title: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋受到印度科技爱好者的 "摇滚明星 "待遇
item.description: 本周四，在印度举行的人工智能峰会上，身着皮夹克的英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋受到了摇滚明星般的欢迎，入场券被抢购一空，技术爱好者们花费数千卢比前往现场。【原文：Nvidia's leather-jacket-clad CEO Jensen Huang got a rock star welcome at the company's AI summit in India on Thursday, with passes sold out and tech enthusiasts spending thousands of rupees to travel to the event.】

item.title: 美国财政部允许矿工获得清洁能源生产补贴
item.description: 美国财政部周四表示，将允许一些矿业公司获得旨在促进美国太阳能电池板、锂离子电池和其他清洁能源组件生产的税收抵免，这是在行业压力下立场的转变。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department said on Thursday it would allow some mining companies to access a tax credit aimed at boosting American production of solar panels, lithium-ion batteries and other clean energy components, a shift in position after industry pressure.】

item.title: 标准普尔全球公司因分析产品需求而上调年度利润预期
item.description: 金融信息公司 S&P Global 周四上调了年度利润预期，由于数据和分析产品需求强劲，第三季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Financial information company S&P Global raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday and beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on strong demand for its data and analytics products.】

item.title: 巴西 10 月中旬通胀回升，电费上涨
item.description: 截至 10 月中旬的一个月里，巴西的通货膨胀率加速上升，因为电费上涨推动了这个拉丁美洲最大经济体的消费价格上涨。【原文：Inflation in Brazil accelerated in the month to mid-October, as higher electricity costs pushed consumer prices up in Latin America's largest economy.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数意外下降
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济的美国人数意外下降，但10月中旬领取救济金的人数增加，这增加了本月失业率上升的风险。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment aid unexpectedly fell last week, but more people were collecting benefits in mid-October, which raises the risk of a rise in the jobless rate this month.】

item.title: 受费率上涨提振，DTE 能源公司季度利润超出预期
item.description: 电力和天然气公用事业公司 DTE Energy 周四公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是较高的供应率和较暖的天气有助于其电力部门的业绩表现。【原文：Electric and gas utility DTE Energy beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Thursday, as higher supply rates and warmer weather helped performance of its electricity unit.】

item.title: 巴西部长表示，巴西将计算潜在国内生产总值，以平衡关于利率的辩论
item.description: 巴西规划部长西蒙娜-特贝特（Simone Tebet）表示，巴西政府正在考虑在官方国内生产总值（GDP）之外计算该国的潜在增长率，以表明经济仍有强劲扩张的空间，同时不会助长通货膨胀。【原文：Brazil's government is considering calculating the country's potential growth rate in addition to the official GDP to show that there is room for the economy to expand robustly without fueling inflation, according to Planning Minister Simone Tebet.】

item.title: 贝莱德为寻求分散风险的投资者推出三只定向 ETF
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）推出了三只新的交易所交易基金（ETF），其中两只提供最大美股的投资机会，一只旨在规避这些股票，这反映了资产管理公司为提供更多量身定制的投资选择所做的努力。【原文：BlackRock has launched three new exchange-traded funds (ETFs), including two that offer exposure to the largest U.S. stocks and one designed to avoid them, reflecting asset managers' efforts to provide more tailored investment options.】

item.title: 联合太平洋第三季度利润增长，原因是运量增加和定价稳健
item.description: 美国铁路运营商联合太平洋公司（Union Pacific）周四公布第三季度利润增长 9%，原因是发货量增加和价格上涨抵消了煤炭货运量的下降。【原文：U.S. railroad operator Union Pacific reported a 9% rise in third-quarter profit on Thursday, as higher shipments and price hikes offset declines in coal freight volumes.】

item.title: 受威奇托罢工影响，德事隆下调年度利润预期
item.description: 赛斯纳喷气机制造商德事隆周四下调了年度利润预期，理由是受到其威奇托工厂 5000 名工人为期四周罢工的影响。【原文：Cessna jet maker Textron lowered its annual profit forecast on Thursday, citing impact of the four-week strike by 5,000 workers at its Wichita plant.】

item.title: 英国监管机构调查 Alphabet 与 Anthropic 的交易
item.description: 英国反垄断监督机构周四对谷歌母公司 Alphabet 与人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 的合作关系展开调查。【原文：Britain's antitrust watchdog launched a probe on Thursday into Google parent Alphabet's partnership with artificial intelligence startup Anthropic.】

item.title: 美国大选局势紧张为巴西下一次利率决策蒙上阴影
item.description: 巴西央行的政策制定者们将在 11 月份的利率制定会议上面临一个超出当地通胀数据的额外和不可预测的担忧：美国总统大选。【原文：Policymakers at Brazil's central bank will head into their November interest rate-setting meeting with an additional and unpredictable concern that goes way beyond local inflation figures: the U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 加拿大罗杰斯公司季度新增用户数量低于预期
item.description: 加拿大罗杰斯通信公司（Rogers Communications）周四公布的第三季度无线新增用户数未能达到市场预期，原因是该公司在移动计划上的谨慎支出以及电信领域的激烈竞争。【原文：Canada's Rogers Communications on Thursday missed market expectations for third-quarter wireless subscriber additions, hit by cautious spending on its mobile plans and stiff competition in the telecom space.】

item.title: 由于诊断测试需求旺盛，Labcorp 季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 受诊断测试需求的推动，实验室运营商 Labcorp 周四公布的第三季度利润和收入均超出华尔街预期。【原文：Laboratory operator Labcorp on Thursday beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit and revenue, helped by demand for diagnostic tests.】

item.title: 纳斯达克第三季度利润因金融科技股走强而增长
item.description: 纳斯达克（Nasdaq）周四公布第三季度利润增长，主要得益于其解决方案业务的强劲需求，该业务是交易所运营商的金融技术产品。【原文：Nasdaq reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by strong demand in its solutions business that houses the exchange operator's financial technology products.】

item.title: 美国航空公司提高 2024 年利润预期，原因是定价有所改善
item.description: 美国航空公司周四上调了年度利润预期，原因是旅游需求有弹性，以及航空公司削减运力提高了定价能力，使其股价在收盘前上涨了 3%。【原文：American Airlines lifted its annual profit forecast on Thursday, on resilient travel demand and improved pricing power as airlines trim capacity, sending its shares up 3% before the bell.】

item.title: TKO 集团将以 32.5 亿美元收购 Endeavor 体育部分资产
item.description: TKO Group Holdings 周四表示，它将收购 Endeavor Group Holdings 旗下的部分体育资产，交易价值 32.5 亿美元。【原文：TKO Group Holdings said on Thursday it would acquire some of Endeavor Group Holdings' sports assets in a deal valued at $3.25 billion.】

item.title: 哈雷戴维森因需求疲软下调全年收入预期
item.description: 哈雷戴维森公司下调了今年的收入预期，原因是通货膨胀严重和借贷成本高企损害了北美市场对摩托车的需求，导致该公司股价在收盘前下跌了 7%。【原文：Harley-Davidson trimmed its revenue forecast for the year as sticky inflation and high borrowing costs hurt demand for motorcycles in North America, sending the company's shares down 7% before the bell.】

item.title: KKR 季度利润飙升，手续费收入创历史新高
item.description: 另类基金管理公司 KKR & Co 公布的 2024 年第三季度调整后净收入猛增 58%，主要得益于创纪录的费用相关收入以及保险业务收益。【原文：Alternative fund manager KKR & Co reported a 58% jump in adjusted net income for the third quarter of 2024, driven by record fee-related income, as well as earnings from its insurance business.】

item.title: 全球国防开支攀升，诺斯罗普-格鲁曼再次上调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 由于中东冲突和旷日持久的俄乌战争导致全球国防开支增加，美国国防公司诺斯罗普-格鲁曼（Northrop Grumman）周四第二次上调了2024年的利润预期。【原文：U.S. defense company Northrop Grumman on Thursday raised its 2024 profit forecast for the second time, amid increased global defense spending prompted by conflicts in the Middle East and the protracted Russia-Ukraine war.】

item.title: 西南航空公布第三季度业绩，因定价改善而意外盈利
item.description: 美国西南航空公司周四公布，受益于价格和需求的改善，以及因七月份全球网络中断而滞留的乘客重新预订机票，该公司第三季度意外盈利。【原文：Southwest Airlines reported a surprise third-quarter profit on Thursday, benefiting from improved pricing and demand, as well as rebookings from passengers stranded due to the global cyber outage in July.】

item.title: 瓦莱罗能源公司公布季度利润下降，原因是炼油利润率疲软
item.description: 由于炼油利润率下降，瓦莱罗能源公司（Valero Energy）周四公布的第三季度利润下滑了 86%，但仍超出了华尔街的预期。【原文：Refiner Valero Energy posted a 86% slump in third-quarter profit on Thursday on falling refining margins, but managed to beat Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: 玩具需求疲软，孩之宝季度销售额降幅超预期
item.description: 孩之宝公司（Hasbro）周四公布的第三季度销售额降幅超过预期，原因是消费者收紧了玩具消费，但该公司严格的成本控制提高了利润率。【原文：Hasbro on Thursday posted a steeper-than-expected drop in sales for the third quarter as consumers tightened spending on toys, but the company's stringent cost controls boosted margins.】

item.title: 瑞士银行家对更严格的资本规则计划表示担忧
item.description: 瑞士银行家协会周四批评了政府在瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）于 2023 年倒闭后对瑞银提出更严格资本要求的计划，称这些措施可能会损害瑞士金融业的竞争力。【原文：The Swiss Bankers Association on Thursday criticised government plans for tougher capital requirements on UBS following the 2023 collapse of Credit Suisse, saying the measures could hurt the competitiveness of the country's financial sector.】

item.title: 企业支出放缓施压咨询业增长，IBM业绩下滑
item.description: IBM 股价在周四的盘前交易中下跌了约 5%，原因是企业在非 GenAI 项目上的支出减少，给其咨询部门带来压力，从而削弱了软件部门的实力。【原文：IBM shares fell about 5% in premarket trading on Thursday, as reduced enterprise spending on non-GenAI projects pressured its consulting segment, clouding software unit strength.】

item.title: 陶氏开始审查部分欧洲资产，第三季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 陶氏化学公司周四表示，尽管由于美国和加拿大对包装用聚乙烯等工业产品的需求增加，该公司第三季度利润超出预期，但该公司已开始对其部分欧洲资产进行审查。【原文：Chemical company Dow said on Thursday it has begun a review of some of its European assets even as its third-quarter profit beat estimates on higher demand in the U.S. and Canada for industrial items such as polyethylene used in packaging.】

item.title: 欧盟隐私监管机构对 LinkedIn 罚款 3.1 亿欧元
item.description: 欧盟主要隐私监管机构周四表示，已对微软旗下职业网络平台 LinkedIn 的定向广告行为处以 3.1 亿欧元（3.35 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：The lead European Union privacy regulator on Thursday said it had imposed a 310 million euro ($335 million) fine on Microsoft's professional networking platform LinkedIn over its targeted advertising practices.】

item.title: UPS 公布第三季度利润增长，原因是销量反弹和成本削减
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周四公布第三季度利润增长，原因是节假日旺季来临前的货运量反弹提高了收入，而成本削减帮助抵消了消费者转向更便宜的快递选择对利润率的冲击。【原文：United Parcel Service reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Thursday, as rebounding volumes ahead of the holiday season lifted revenues, while cost cuts helped offset the margin hit from consumers shifting to cheaper delivery options.】

item.title: 数据显示，减肥药并未在两年内降低医疗成本
item.description: 路透社获得的一份美国医疗保险理赔分析报告显示，Wegovy 等药物可能会减少你的腰围，但不会减少医疗费用。【原文：Drugs like Wegovy may trim your waistline but not medical costs, according to an analysis of U.S. health insurance claims shared with Reuters.】
